title: 2.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Modern computers are smaller, lighter, faster and more powerful.
What do you think computers will look like when you are 18 years old? Use your imagination and draw inside the box.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
